text: (iṟai) tūtar. Tam iṟaivaṉiṭamiruntu tamakku aruḷappeṟṟatai nampukiṟār; (avvāṟē) muḥmiṉkaḷum (nampukiṉṟaṉar; ivarkaḷ) yāvarum allāhvaiyum, avaṉuṭaiya malakkukaḷaiyum, avaṉuṭaiya vētaṅkaḷaiyum, avaṉuṭaiya tūtarkaḷaiyum nampukiṟārkaḷ. "Nām iṟai tūtarkaḷil evar oruvaraiyum pirittu vēṟṟumai pārāṭṭuvatillai (eṉṟum) iṉṉum nāṅkaḷ cevimaṭuttōm; (uṉ kaṭṭaḷaikaḷukku) nāṅkaḷ vaḻippaṭṭōm; eṅkaḷ iṟaivaṉē! Uṉṉiṭamē maṉṉippuk kōrukiṟōm; (nāṅkaḷ) mīḷuvatum uṉṉiṭamētāṉ" eṉṟu kūṟukiṟārkaḷ
